meanings.sent1: She sings tolerably well in the choir.
meanings.sent2: He can swim tolerably fast in the pool.
meanings.sent3: The cat tolerably chased the mouse around the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun tolerably peeked through the clouds after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed tolerably in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The movie was tolerably entertaining for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The weather was tolerably warm for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The cake was tolerably sweet for my taste.
meanings.sent4: The workload was tolerably heavy for a Monday.
meanings.sent5: The noise from the party was tolerably loud in the distance.
